text: The pizza is ok. Unfortunately my favorite item at most Boli's is pasta with meatballs. I ordered this item from here and got store bought angel hair pasta. It taste horrible and does not go well with their sauce. I should call the franchise as they are the only location that doesn't have homemade pasta as advertised.

text: The staff who took the order were nice enough, but the delivery time was very disappointing. The person over the phone said it would take 40 minutes for the delivery. The delivery took an hour and when it arrived the sub and fries were cold. Nothing worse than limp fries.
